title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 602 - Uniform Hearing Procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 602 - Uniform Hearing Procedures

State Regulations
§ 602.1 - Applicability
§ 602.2 - General procedures
§ 602.3 - Hearing procedures: certificate of need hearings
§ 602.4 - Hearing procedures: denial or limitation of initial operating certificate hearings
§ 602.5 - Hearing procedures: current operating certificate suspension, revocation, limitation or fine hearings
§ 602.6 - Hearing procedures: denial of operating certificate renewal hearings
§ 602.7 - Hearing procedures: audit appeal hearing
§ 602.8 - Hearing procedures: temporary suspension or limitation of an operating certificate
§ 602.9 - Second level rate and fee appeal procedure
§ 602.10 - Renumbered
§ 602.11 - Declaratory rulings
§ 602.99 - Glossary

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 602

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§13.07, 13.09[b], 16.00, 16.05, 16.09, 16.17, 41.36, 43.02

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
